name: ✦ SmartWallet
title: Development of a budget management webapp
description:
SmartWallet is a budget management web application focused on tracking and managing expenses. It includes:
Real-time expense tracking,
Graphical report generation,
Authentication and authorization,
API integration for currency conversion,
Responsive design.

name: ✦ MovieScope
title: Development of a movie discovery web application
stack: Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, TMDB API
description:
MovieScope is a modern movie discovery web application designed to help users easily find their next movie. It includes:
Real-time search,
Category filtering (top-rated, now playing, genres),
Favorites management,
TMDB API integration,
Responsive design and smooth animations.

name: ✦ ES Web
title: Modern Website for Web Agency
description:
ES Web is a modern website built with Next.js and TypeScript showcasing web agency services. Features include:

- Clean design with glassmorphism effects and smooth animations
- Fully responsive interface optimized for all devices
- Custom animations and interactive components
- Performance optimized with Next.js best practices

name: ✦ Mon vieux grimoire
title: Development of a library webapp
description:
Mon vieux grimoire is an online library project, I focused on the following features:
CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
Authentication,
Token generation,
Password hashing (bcrypt),
Image optimization (multer/sharp)

name: ✦ CodeSnippet
title: Development of a code snippet management platform
stack: Next.js, Node.js, Express, Prisma, PostgreSQL, OAuth
description:
CodeSnippet is a modern platform for developers to manage and share code snippets. Key features include:
Advanced code editor with syntax highlighting,
Public/private snippet management,
Social features (likes, bookmarks),
Google & GitHub OAuth integration,
Responsive design and dark mode support.

name: ✦ PumpFinder
title: Real-time Fuel Price Finder
description:
PumpFinder is a web application that helps users find the cheapest fuel stations nearby. Key features include:
Real-time fuel price updates,
Interactive map with location markers,
Search functionality for cities and addresses,
Responsive design with mobile support.
